CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 22, 1945, pg. 1, reads: "Waiting For Santa - Sylvia and Lenora Simpson, daughters of Mr. and Mrs. Verna Simpson of Oakwood Street are anxiously awaiting the arrival of their friend, Santa Claus. Like all the kids, they are starry eyed and filled with excitement at the thoughts of the goodies Santa is going to leave in their stocking. - Harris Photo"
TitMainTitle: Sylvia Simpson with bare bottom facing forward, and Lenora Simpson looking at chimney with Christmas stocking on mantle, in domestic interior
